thread.title: BRIEF-Carpenter Technology Q2 Sales Rose 14.1 Percent To $487.8 Million

title: BRIEF-Carpenter Technology Q2 Sales Rose 14.1 Percent To $487.8 Million
text:
40 PM / Updated 8 minutes ago BRIEF-Carpenter Technology Q2 Sales Rose 14.1 Percent To $487.8 Million Reuters Staff 
Feb 1 (Reuters) - Carpenter Technology Corp: 
* CARPENTER TECHNOLOGY REPORTS SECOND QUARTER FISCAL YEAR 2018 RESULTS * Q2 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.55 EXCLUDING ITEMS * Q2 EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.92 * Q2 SALES ROSE 14.1 PERCENT TO $487.8 MILLION 
* CARPENTER TECHNOLOGY - RECORDED DISCRETE INCOME TAX NET BENEFIT OF $66.0 MILLION IN QUARTER ENDED DEC 31, 2017 
* IN Q2, ‍ALSO INCLUDED IN NET DISCRETE INCOME TAX BENEFIT IS A CHARGE OF $2.2 MILLION AS A RESULT OF TAX REFORM​ Source text for Eikon:
